items.sentence: I heard Tom speak French yesterday for the first time.
The police are looking into the cause of the accident.
The police managed to track down the owner of the car.
There used to be a big pine tree in front of my house.
Tom says Mary is lying about where she was last night.
Tom\'s car broke down on his way to work this morning.
I\'d already bought my ticket by the time Tom arrived.
I\'d hoped I could stay in Boston for three more days.
I\'d never forgive myself if anything happened to Tom.
I\'ll do whatever I have to do to put Tom behind bars.
